definition: to set on fire/to commit arson
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The person who set the fire will likely face homicide charges for the deaths of two firefighters.
sentences.chinese: 由于两名消防员牺牲，纵火者将面临谋杀的指控。

sentences.english: This fire was no doubt caused by arson.
sentences.chinese: 关于起火原因及纵火者，至今众说纷纭。

sentences.english: They have an analysis on action of pyromania in 44 criminal psychotic cases.
sentences.chinese: 他们对44例精神病违法者的纵火行为进行了分析。

sentences.english: The knaves who set fire to the barn have been caught and sent to the prison.
sentences.chinese: 纵火烧谷仓的骗子被抓起来送到牢里去了。

sentences.english: He claimed that he didnt set fire to the church.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持说没有纵火烧教堂。
是什么造就了一名纵火犯？

sentences.english: Grand theft auto, larceny, robbery, arson, and suspected of murder in Oklahoma.
sentences.chinese: 偷车，盗窃，抢劫，纵火额赫拉荷马州谋杀嫌犯。

sentences.english: He set fire to his own house.
sentences.chinese: 他纵火烧了自己的房子。

sentences.english: Florida investigators are looking for one or more arson suspects linked to several wildfires burning across central portion of the state.
sentences.chinese: 佛罗里达州的调查官员正在搜寻纵火案嫌疑人。

sentences.english: Police are investigating the cause of the fire and say arson has not been ruled out.
sentences.chinese: 警方正在调差起火原因，并且称不排除是纵火。

sentences.english: Someone is setting fire to a house.
The police forensic expert said the blaze was started by a fire bug.
sentences.chinese: 警方法律专家说那火是纵火者放的。

sentences.english: Gary: Well yes, I'm sorry to say the burglars also set fire to your property.
sentences.chinese: 嗯是的，我很抱歉告诉您抢劫犯还纵火烧了您的房子。

sentences.english: Everyone is gonna think I'm an arsonist.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都会认为我是个纵火犯。

sentences.english: After being rebuilt, the orphanage was set on fire a second time that same year.
sentences.chinese: 孤儿院重建之后，又在同一年再次被蓄意纵火。

sentences.english: The fire was set by an arsonist. ;

definition: to set on fire/to commit arson/to create a disturbance
to burn down/to destroy with fire/trad. also written 焚毀
to burn down/to destroy with fire
violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)
to massacre everyone in a captured city
